title: plantandfoodresearch/pangene pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

tag.errorMessage: Assembly tags must be provided and can only contain alphanumeric characters including '_'

fasta.errorMessage: FASTA file path cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.f(a|asta|as|sa|na)' or '.f(a|asta|as|sa|na).gz'

is_masked.errorMessage: Masking information must be provided as 'yes' or 'no'

te_lib.errorMessage: TE library FASTA file path cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.f(a|asta|as|sa|na)' or '.f(a|asta|as|sa|na).gz'

annotation_gff3.errorMessage: Annotation GFF3 file path cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.gff.gz', '.gff3.gz', '.gff' or '.gff3'

annotation_hints.errorMessage: Annotation hints GFF/GFF3 file path cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.gff.gz', '.gff3.gz', '.gff' or '.gff3'
